prompt: The "Bell" in the top right corner is not available, also not when the "Alert Notification" extension is installed.
expected_answer: Make sure that notifications are enabled in your wiki. You can enable them by setting the `notifications.enabled` setting in `xwiki.properties` to `true`.
ai_answer:
https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/ 
https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/ 


**Troubleshooting Issue: Missing Bell Icon**

You've noticed that the "Bell" icon in the top right corner is not available, even after installing the `Alert Notification` extension. Don't worry, we're here to help you troubleshoot this issue!

To resolve this, let's check some common causes and potential solutions:

1. **Extension Configuration**: Ensure that the `Alert Notification` extension is properly configured. Check the extension's settings and documentation for any specific requirements or setup procedures.
2. **Notification Settings**: Review your notification settings to see if they're set to display notifications in the desired manner. You can check this by going to **Settings** > **Notifications**.
3. **Bell Icon Configuration**: Verify that the Bell icon is not being overridden by another extension or custom CSS. Check your wiki's `xwiki.cfg` file or custom CSS files for any modifications that might be affecting the icon's visibility.

If none of these solutions work, please provide more details about your setup, and we'll do our best to help you troubleshoot this issue further!

sources.content:
# Description

This application contributes content in the Alert menu (contributed by the [Alerts Application](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Alerts%20Application/)) in the top bar, represented by a bell:

![Notifications.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/Notifications.png?rev=1.4)

You can find under this menu the notifications about some events happening on the wiki (a page has been modified, a new blog post has been posted, etc...).

The number of notifications is displayed on the top menu, just above the bell:

![notif1.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/notif1.png?rev=1.5)

If you have more than 20 unread notifications, you will not see the real count but this instead:

![MaxCounter.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/MaxCounter.png?rev=1.3)

When you open the menu, the content of the notifications is loaded:

![NotificationsLoading.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/NotificationsLoading.png?rev=1.3)

Then you can see the list of notifications:

[![notif2.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/notif2.png?rev=1.5)](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/notif2.png?rev=1.5)![NotificationsMacro.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/NotificationsMacro.png?rev=1.3)

If you click on the little button with the "check" icon, you mark the notification as "read". In the future, you will be able to select either you want to see only unread notifications or all of them.

When the notification is read, the button disappear and the background color changes:

| bell | **Display notifications about events happening in the wiki.** |
| --- | --- |



| Type | XAR |
| --- | --- |
| Category | Application |
| Developed by | [XWiki Development Team](https://xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/XWikiTeam) |
| Rating | *  * [1](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/ "Poor") * [2](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/ "Satisfactory") * [3](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/ "Good") * [4](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/ "Very good") * [5](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/ "Excellent")    0 Votes |
| License | GNU Lesser General Public License 2.1 |



| Bundled With | XWiki Standard |
| --- | --- |

**Installable with the Extension Manager**

[Download v16.3.1](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/rest/repository/extensions/org.xwiki.platform%3Axwiki-platform-notifications-ui/versions/16.3.1/file?rid=maven-xwiki)[Sources](https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/tree/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-notifications/xwiki-platform-notifications-ui/)[Issues](https://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI)

Table of contents

* [Description](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/#HDescription)
	+ [Group of notifications with details](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/#HGroupofnotificationswithdetails)
	+ [Get a notification RSS feed](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/#HGetanotificationRSSfeed)
	+ [Notifications Macro](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/#HNotificationsMacro)
* [Settings](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/#HSettings)
	+ [Filters](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/#HFilters)
		- [Hidden (technical) pages](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/#HHidden28technical29pages)
		- [Filter your own events](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/#HFilteryourownevents)
		- [Filter events that you have marked as read](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/#HFiltereventsthatyouhavemarkedasread)
		- [Filter minor events](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/#HFilterminorevents)
	+ [Watched Entities](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/#HWatchedEntities)
		- [Using it](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/#HUsingit)
		- [Auto Watch](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/#HAutoWatch)
		- [Follow a user](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/#HFollowauser)
		- [Default Watch Settings](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/#HDefaultWatchSettings)

![text_list_bullets](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/text_list_bullets.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Menu](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Menu%20Application)  
Menu application

![bell](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/bell.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Notifications](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/)  
Display notifications about events happening in the wiki.

![invitation.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Invitation%20Application/invitation.png?rev=1.3)

[Invitation](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Invitation%20Application)  
Allows users to send emails, inviting friends and colleagues to join a wiki

# Other Features

Other features can be added to your wiki by [installing](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Extension%20Manager%20Application) extensions not listed above. Check the [Extensions wiki](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/) for a full list of available extensions.

# Dependencies

Dependencies for this extension (org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-notifications-ui 16.3.1):

* org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-notifications-preferences-default 16.3.1
* [org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-notifications-macro-ui](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Macro/) 16.3.1
* org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-notifications-script 16.3.1
* org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-notifications-filters-default 16.3.1
* org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-notifications-notifiers-default 16.3.1
* org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-notifications-filters-watch 16.3.1
* org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-notifications-rest 16.3.1
* org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-eventstream-store-solr 16.3.1
* org.webjars:bootstrap-switch 3.3.4
* [org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-rendering-macro-velocity](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Velocity%20Macro) 16.3.1
* org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-icon-script 16.3.1
* [org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-user-profile-ui](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/User%20Module/User%20Profile%20Application/) 16.3.1
* [org.xwiki.rendering:xwiki-rendering-macro-html](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/HTML%20Macro) 16.3.1
* [org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-alerts-ui](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Alerts%20Application/) 16.3.1
* [org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-date](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Date%20Script%20Service/) 16.3.1
* [org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-rendering-macro-code](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Code%20Macro/) 16.3.1
* [org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-livedata-macro](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Live%20Data%20Macro/) 16.3.1
* org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-livedata-livetable 16.3.1
* org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-notifications-webjar 16.3.1
